product.title: Plug & Play AI for Your Business
product.description: SonarWave Technologies Inc. builds tailor-made AI systems designed to optimize your workflows and accelerate growth. Update your configuration and assets to make this page your own.

items.title: AI Agents
items.description: Intelligent autonomous agents that automate customer support, data research, scheduling, and more. Reduce manual work by 80%.

items.title: Automation Pipelines
items.description: Robust, scalable pipelines that connect company data, automate emails and content generation, and deliver real-time insights.

features.title: What We Build
features.subtitle: Powered by Cutting-Edge AI Tools
features.description: Our comprehensive AI solutions leverage the latest technologies to transform your business operations and drive measurable results.

items.name: Custom Domain LLMs
items.description: Fine-tuned language models adapted to your industry terminology and data for superior accuracy.

items.name: Risk Detection & Compliance
items.description: LLM-powered contract and document analysis that flags anomalies and compliance risks early.

items.name: PyTorch & Deep Learning
items.description: Advanced frameworks for building and deploying sophisticated AI models at scale.

items.name: Cloud & On-Premise Solutions
items.description: Scalable deployment options that fit your infrastructure requirements and security needs. Deploy on your company network.

items.title: Medical Invoice Automation
items.description: Developed AI systems that detect and load over 10,000 historical invoices for medical clinics, automating the generation of new billing documents and drastically reducing manual effort.

items.title: Algorithmic Trading Backtesting
items.description: Built modular backtesting frameworks and execution simulators for traders, enabling faster strategy iteration and improved deployment confidence.

items.title: Contract Red Flag Detection
items.description: Leveraged large language models combined with domain rules to identify anomalies and risky clauses in contracts, reducing manual review time and improving risk detection.

sections.name: About
sections.content: SonarWave Technologies Inc. specializes in enterprise AI solutions that deliver measurable ROI. We build custom AI agents, automation pipelines, and fine-tuned language models.

sections.name: Solutions
sections.content: Our AI solutions include intelligent agents for customer support, scalable automation pipelines, custom domain LLMs, and risk detection systems for compliance.

sections.name: Case Studies
sections.content: We've successfully delivered projects ranging from medical invoice automation to algorithmic trading systems, consistently reducing manual effort and improving accuracy.

sections.name: Contact
sections.content: Ready to transform your business with AI? Contact us for a free strategy consultation and discover how we can optimize your workflows.
